584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:27): <s>? or is <s> superscript?
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:27): any tag can be used
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:27): just apply the text-decoration CSS property
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:27): i thought <sup> and <sub> were for super and sub
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:27): so is <s> for strike thru?
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:28): i purposely dont use css
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:28): you shouldn't use HTML tags to suggest presentation
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:28): that's a bit stupid
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:29): if i shouldnt use html tags why is this #html
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:30): HTML and CSS are used for different purposes
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:30): <b> is used for bold right?
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:30): font-weight: bold is used for bold
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:31): css is the reason html takes so long to lozd
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:31): rubbish
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:31): CSS files can be cached
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:31): presentation sent in an HTML fil has to be sent every time the file is loaded
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:31): i only want to use <S> for a single page
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:31): so CSS actually reduces page load times
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:32): my html page is less than 1kb
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:32): good for you
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:32): so what html tag does strike thru?
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:32): you are trolling me
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:32): i want to know a specific thing about html and you tell me something differen
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:33): I'm telling you that you're useing a method which hasn't been recommended since last century
584161534dafcbd0ee840386d12739ae (04:34): and i am wondering why you just dont tell me
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:34): because we like to recommend *good* ways to do things in here

f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:35): it does answer HTML questions
f9f55a3e8be14fc877a9ae5642b53041 (04:35): it doesn't answer questions about things which should be CSS
